page.title: 08FUTURE PROVISION OF HEALTH
page.content: The following improvements shall be made: 1.a)Reprovision of Redhills Hospital on the R.D.&E.(Wonford) site. b)Closure of the W.E.E.I. c)Provision of the nucleus for a local hospital, in Exeter, at Whipton. These 3 services will greatly improve geriatric care & ophthalmology. 2.Replacement of theatres & wards at the P.E.O.H. 3.Movement of renal dialysis service from Whipton to R.D.&E.(Heavitree) to concentrate District General Hospital services & release Whipton Hospital accommodation. 4.Provision of a central maternity unit at the R.D.&E.(Heavitree). {CONCLUSION.} The Health Service is to become more efficient with the careful direction of public funds.
